item.title: 【摘录】哈利 · 波特 与混血王子（2005）
item.description: The Prime Minister did not know what to say to this, but a persistent habit of wishing to appear well-informed on any subject that came up made him cast around for any details he could remember of their previous conversations. » 首相听了这话,竟一时不知道该说什么好,但他有一个根深蒂固的

item.title: 【摘录】哈利 · 波特 与密室（1998）
item.description: I think I’d better do the actual stealing » 我们需要声东击西 » Fascinating creatures, phoenixes. They can carry immensely heavy loads, their tears have healing powers, and they make highly faithful pets.” » 凤凰真是十分奇特迷人的生命。它们能携带极为沉重的

item.title: 【摘录】哈利 · 波特 与凤凰社（2003）
item.description: !!! [tag outline] Photo by Hudson Hintze on Unsplash[/tag] !!! There you go, Sirius, Harry thought dully. Nothing rash. Kept my nose clean. Exactly the opposite of what you’d have done … » 你可以放心了,小天狼星,哈利闷闷不乐地想,不做鲁莽的事,安分守己,

item.title: 【摘录】哈利 · 波特 与火焰杯（2000）
item.description: !!! !!! Your devotion is nothing more than cowardice » 什么忠心耿耿，你只是胆小罢了 » Wormtail, I need somebody with brains, somebody whose loyalty has never wavered, and you, unfortunately, fulfill neither requirement.” » “虫尾巴，我需要一个有脑子的

item.title: 【摘录】哈利 · 波特 与阿兹卡班的囚徒（1999）
item.description: !!! !!! 1. He was stranded, quite alone, in the dark Muggle world, with absolutely nowhere to go. 他很孤独地搁浅在黑暗的麻瓜世界里，没有任何地方可以去。 2. While Muggles have been told that Black is carrying a gun (a kind of metal wand that Muggles use to kill each other), the
